digraph{rankdir=TB;node[shape=box];main[label="HTTP/2-based DDoS Attacks"];attacks[label="Attacks Characteristics"];mitigations[label="Mitigation Strategies"];variants[label="Attack Variants"];industry[label="Industry Coordination"];applicability[label="Applicability to other protocols"];next_steps[label="Next Steps"];main->attacks;main->mitigations;main->variants;main->industry;main->applicability;main->next_steps;attack_size[label="Larger than previous Layer 7 attacks
